naslov: KUĆA sa 7 APARTMANA s prostranim parkingom - otvoreni pogled na more - (prodaja)
opis: Molimo zvati na broj mob: +385 98 1953463. Hvala. Kuća se nalazi u Okrugu Gornjem na mirnoj lokaciji u zadnjem urbaniziranom redu, pa se iza kuće nalazi šuma Udaljena je svega 200 m od mora,a 300m od poznate plaže Saldun. Otok Čiovo je povezan sa kopnom sa dva mosta: stari most ga povezuje sa povjesnim centrom Trogira, a drugi, novi , sa glavnom prilaznom cestom koja tu zonu povezuje sa aerodromom i autoputem. Prema prostornom planu sa stražnje strane kuće će proći cesta koja se spaja s novim mostom (Općina je već izvlastila dio zemljišta), tako da će se kući u budućnosti moći prići sa 2 strane. Kuća se sastoji od ukupno 7 potpuno namještenih i klimatiziranih apartmana, koje su organizirane na slijedeći način: U prizemlju se nalazi trosobni stan ukupne kvadrature 90m2 koji izlazi na prostranu terasu od 20m2. Na prvom i drugom katu su smještena po dva jednosobna apartmana od po 40m2, a na trećem 2 studio apartmana od po 35m2. Svaki apartman ima izlaz na balkon odakle s pruža prekrasan pogled na more i okoliš. U suterenu se nalazi konoba i strojarnica s hidroforom. Voda se grije pomoću solarnih panela. S prednje strane kuće nalazi se mali vrt, dok se sa stražnje nalazi veliki parking za 8 osobnih vozila, 3 sjenice sa zidanim roštiljom i vrt . Ukupna površina okućnice iznosi oko 450 m2. Ova struktura se već godinama uspješno iznajmljuje u turističke svrhe. Osigurana sva pravna, logistička i stručna usluga. Ostale informacije na upit:mob: +385 98 195 3463 mail: split@kvadar-nekretnine.hr www.kvadar-nekretnine.hr Hvala. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- HOUSE with 7 APARTMENTS with sea view - Okrug Gornji - Čiovo Island Please call the mobile number: +385 98 1953463. Thank you. The house is located in Okrug Gornji in a quiet location in the last urbanized row, so there is a forest behind the house. It is only 200 m from the sea and 300 m from the famous Saldun beach. The island of Čiovo is connected to the mainland by two bridges: the old bridge connects it to the historic center of Trogir, and the second, new one, to the main access road that connects the area to the airport and the highway. According to the spatial plan, a road connecting to the new bridge will pass from the back of the house (the municipality has already expropriated part of the land), so that the house will be accessible from 2 sides in the future. The house consists of a total of 7 fully furnished and air-conditioned residential units, which are organized as follows: On the ground floor there is a three-room apartment with a total square footage of 90m2, which opens onto a spacious terrace of 20m2. There are two one-room apartments on the first and second floors, and 2 studio apartments on the third floor, all of 40m2. Each apartment has access to a balcony with a beautiful view of the sea and the surrounding area. In the basement, there is a tavern and a machine room with a water heater. The water is heated using solar panels. There is a small garden at the front of the house, while at the back there is a large parking lot for 8 cars, 3 gazebos with a brick grill and a garden. The total area of ​​the garden is about 450 m2. This structure has been successfully rented out for tourist purposes for years. All legal, logistical and professional services are provided. Other information on request: mobile: +385 98 195 3463 mail: split@kvadar-nekretnine.hr www.kvadar-nekretnine.hr Thank you.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
